com.xlpoolsion.server.model.entities

Class EntityModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xlpoolsion.server.model.entities.EntityModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BombModel, BreakableBrickModel, BrickModel, ExplosionModel, PlayerModel, PowerDownModel, PowerUpModel, StunPowerModel

    public class EntityModel
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract model representing an entity belonging to a game model.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EntityModel(float x, float y, float rotation)
      Constructs a model with a position and a rotation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityModel

        public EntityModel(float x,
                   float y,
                   float rotation)
        Constructs a model with a position and a rotation.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of this entity in meters.
        y - The y-coordinate of this entity in meters.
        rotation - The current rotation of this entity in radians.
